meanings.definition: Not under the influence of anesthesia.
meanings.sent1: The patient was unanesthetized during the entire surgery.
meanings.sent2: The dentist ensured the area was unanesthetized before starting the procedure.
meanings.sent3: The unanesthetized clown accidentally honked his nose during the show.
meanings.sent4: Her unanesthetized emotions were raw and overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: The unanesthetized reality of the situation hit him hard.

meanings.definition: Not numbed or dulled by anesthesia.
meanings.sent1: The unanesthetized wound caused him great pain.
meanings.sent2: She felt the unanesthetized sensation of the needle piercing her skin.
meanings.sent3: The unanesthetized taste of the bitter medicine made her grimace.
meanings.sent4: His unanesthetized mind raced with clarity and focus.
meanings.sent5: The unanesthetized nerve endings screamed in agony.
